attributes.action: End Leicester lockdown completely. It has affected Leicester economy And holiday
attributes.additional_details: The councillors are not taking our livelihoods or our mental health into consideration in meeting family members in other cities or a getaway for us who have had a tough year. They have enough data and testing to handle the Covid 19 and which areas need extra attention. Also testing has increased. Police should have more powers to those who break social distancing rules
attributes.background: End lockdown completely inLeicester despite what local councillors are saying

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329878
